NI-9145 EtherCAT Slave

NI-9145 EtherCAT Slave is a container for an NI 9145 EtherCAT slave connected to an EtherCAT master on your controller.

Slave Position indicates the location of the EtherCAT slave relative to the EtherCAT Master (with position 0 being the closest). For example, if you have three EtherCAT slaves all daisy-chained together off of the same EtherCAT master, the slave closest to the master will be position 0, then next slave will be position 1, and the last slave will be position 2.

What do you want to do?

View or change slot and module settings

To view settings for a slot in the chassis, select the appropriate slot in the configuration tree.

Select a custom FPGA personality for the chassis

To view or chage the FPGA configuration of the NI 9145 slave, select User Variables in the configuration tree.
